title: San Serif Help
content:
Any help would be appreciated.  
Thanks!

comments.content:
closest i can find at this point is the following:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/fb-agency/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023181141/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/fb-agency/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/fb-agency/")
Somebody has redrawn all the letters with curves - they are quite different in character and much cruder than the /M/A/I/N/.
